attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should stop pushing interst rates down to encourage more (unsustainable) borrowing and consider the plight of pensioners who rely on savings to boost their income.  They should remove tax from savings.

rejection.details: Interest rates are set by the Bank of England, not by the Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
